content.rendered:
Directed by Atlee.

Written by Atlee. Vijayendra Prasad. Ramanagirivasan. Atlee. Rajendra Sapre.

Cast Joseph Vijay(Vetrimaaran / Maaran / Vetri). Nithya Menen(Aishwarya Vetrimaaran (as Nithya Menon)). S.J. Suryah(Dr. Daniel Arokyaraj (as S.J. Surya)). Samantha Ruth Prabhu(Tara (as Samantha)). Kajal Aggarwal(Anupallavi (as Kajal Agarwal)). Vadivelu(Vadivu (as Vadivel)). Kovai Sarala(Sarala). Sathyaraj(DCP Rathnavel (Randy) (as Satyaraj)). Motta Rajendran(Health minister (as Rajendran)). Sathyan(Police Officer). Yogi Babu(Nolan). Kaali Venkat(Auto Driver). Hareesh Peradi(Dr. Arjun Zachariah). Devadarshini Chetan(Nurse (as Devatharshini)). Surekha Vani(Nurse). Misha Ghoshal(Media Anchor).Abdul. Shivani Murali(Paapu).Akshath. Aakshath Das(Maaran) . Ana Dancchevska(Magician Assistant). Sai Dheena(Prisoner). Kamaraj(Kasi).Piotr Kosiba.Tomasz Kosiba. Abdool Lee(Vetrimaaran friebd (as Abdool)). Sangili Murugan(Salim Ghosh).Mahi Parasuraman. Mamilla Shailaja Priya(Tara’s mother). Senthikumari(Selvi). Pasanga Sivakumar(Hospital HR).Arkadiusz Tancula. Christopher Bloswick(Humanitarian Award Speaker (uncredited))

Language Tamil.

Producers Marcin AndruchÃ³w. Ilija Ciriviri. Dejan Iliev. KS Jairam. Mahendran.. H. Murali. Sanjay Kumar Pal. N. Ramasamy. Natarajan Ramji. Hema Rukmani.

Production Sri Thenandal Films. Goldmines Telefilms.
